<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_ex_sp.FavoriteAPI</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>API for creating , removing & validating favorite items of user.</description> <name>FavoriteAPI</name> <script><![CDATA[var FavoriteAPI = Class.create(); FavoriteAPI.prototype = Object.extendsObject(FavoriteAPISNC, {
